title: Everyone, rejoice! The electric Volkswagen ID Buzz minivan is finally here
content:
The electric transformation of Volkswagen’s iconic T1 microbus has been in the making for five years — a decade if we count the various Bulli concepts VW has consistently teased us with. Now, the VW ID Buzz has finally made its debut as an all-electric, multi-purpose vehicle (MPV) and cargo van. Was it worth the wait? ABSOLUTELY. Feast your eyes! On the left, the ID Buzz. On the right, the ID Buzz Cargo. Image: Volkswagen Design-wise the ID Buzz is clearly channeling the retro DNA of the original T1. Notice the dual-tone paint scheme, V-angled face, short front and rear…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Volkswagen has revealed its anticipated, electric ID Buzz van and it was worth the wait.
